name: A.P.P.L.E.
description:
HyperGnosys collaborated with Laura Elidedt Rodrigues and Ethan Avila in The Fruits Of Consciousness, a virtual installation based on the theories of sight, knowledge, and consciousness fundamentally inspired by the scientific literature of Lynne A. Isbell regarding the connection and coevolution between the serpent, human, the fruit, and the tree in relation to our biological history. 

This project was displayed in Ars Electronica 2020, you can read the article here: https://ars.electronica.art/keplersgardens/en/post-non-human/

And you can find the Pangerdania article with the experience here: https://pangardenia.art/en/gardens/plody-soznaniya/
